Key Match Events: Klay Thompson had a rough shooting night against the LA Clippers, going 0-for-9 from the field and 0-for-6 from three-point range
Pre-Game Insights: Fans hoped to see Thompson sustain his performance against the Clippers
Post-Match Reflections: Jason Kidd took Thompson out of the game after he missed two 3-pointers in the third quarter
Thompson had a plus-minus rating of -14, the worst among the starters
Miscellaneous Highlights: Thompson had a couple of open shots that he couldn’t convert
Thompson contributed three rebounds and one assist, but he had four turnovers
Others: The starting lineup featured Jaden Hardy, P.J. Washington, Dereck Lively II, undrafted rookie Jazian Gortman, and Klay Thompson
Kidd went to Thompson as his primary option to put up the points, but it didn’t go well
